segments.text: Thank you . I try to keep in shape .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , as long as I can find the time . I like swimming best .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What style of swimming do you like best ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I like the back best . I am good at freestyle stroke , but I usually use breast stroke as it keeps me from getting tired .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I think butterfly stroke is the most difficult style to learn .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I agree . I'm not good at it , either . Can you swim ? How about going for a swim this Saturday ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , no . I am quite a stone in the water and cannot swim .
segments.speaker: S1
